application_type_full: Householder planning & demolition in a conservation area
description: Installation of new window to first floor side elevation
decision_conditions: <p>The proposal, by reason of its location, and design<span style="background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial; font-size: 12pt; white-space: pre-wrap;">, <span style="font-size: 14px;">would be </span></span><span style="background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial; font-size: 11pt; white-space: pre-wrap;">visually obtrusive in the streetscene and </span><span style="background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial; font-size: 14px; white-space: pre-wrap;">adversely affect the character and appearance of the </span><span id="docs-internal-guid-1250d2fe-7fff-05f3-719c-e60c9f4a6d8e"><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">Graham Road &amp; Mapledene</span><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;"> </span></span><span style="background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial; font-size: 14px; white-space: pre-wrap;">Conservation Area and the host building. It would therefore be contrary to policies LP1 (Design Quality and Local Character) and LP3 (Designated Heritage Assets) of the Hackney Local Plan 2033, policies </span><span style="background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">D4 (Delivering good design) and HC1 (Heritage conservation and growth) of the London Plan and paragraph 134 of the </span><span style="font-family: Arial; white-space: pre-wrap;">NPPF.</span></p>
